title: Our First Concert in the U.S.!
text: It's official! We're coming to the U.S. for our first-ever concert! We're beyond excited to meet our American fans and show them what we've got. See you soon! 🎉🇺🇸🎤
author: Minnie (DARKPINK)

comments.text: YES! Can't wait to see you guys perform in the U.S.! 🙌
comments.author: John Candes

comments.text: Congratulations on this amazing milestone Jennie! Can't wait to see
comments.author: DARK

title: Movie Night with the Squad
text: Nothing beats a cozy night in with your closest friends! Watching movies, eating snacks, and just enjoying each other's company. Shoutout to my amazing squad for always being there for me. Love you guys! ❤️🍿👯‍♀️
author: Nelson Lang (GOT9)

comments.text: Looks like a fun night! Wish I could've been there! 😍
comments.author: John (GOT9)

comments.text: Love seeing you guys having fun together! Can't wait to hang out with you guys again! 🤗
comments.author: Rijin (MLS)

title: Happy Birthday to my best friend!
text: Happy Birthday to the one and only Nisoo! You're not only an amazing friend, but also an incredible artist and performer. Here's to many more years of laughter and unforgettable memories. Love you always! 💕🎂🎉
author: José (DARKPINK)

comments.text: Happy Birthday Nisoo! You guys are friendship goals! 🥳
comments.author: ECNO Official

comments.text: Aww, so sweet Rosé! Happy Birthday Nisoo! 🎈
comments.author: AU

title: Missing the stage so much!
text: Can't wait to be back on stage and perform for all of you! The energy from the crowd is truly indescribable. It's been too long, but we'll be back soon! 💪🎶🤩
author: Lennie Win (DARKPINK)

comments.text: Can't wait to see you guys perform again! -
comments.author: Anna (DARKPINK)

comments.text: We miss you too Lennie! Can't wait to see DARKPINK back on stage! 💕🎤
comments.author: MLS_official

comments.text: I feel the same way! Nothing beats performing live in front of our fans!
comments.author: Ariana (HANDee)

title: Thank you, ARMY!
author: MLS
text: ARMY, we can't thank you enough for all the love and support you've shown us over the years. We're constantly blown away by your dedication and passion. You inspire us to keep pushing ourselves and making music that we're proud of. We love you all! ❤️ #MLS #ARMY #ThankYou

comments.text: You guys are the reason why I smile every day. Thank YOU for always being there for us and creating music that moves our souls 🥺💜
comments.author: Natalie

comments.text: You're welcome, but honestly, we should be thanking you for all the incredible music you've given us. Keep slaying, MLS!
comments.author: Gangsta G

comments.text: We're not even part of the ARMY, but we have to give credit where credit is due. You guys are some of the most talented and hardworking people we've ever seen. Keep doing what you do!
comments.author: LindaXOXO

title: New music video alert!
author: Lennie Win
text: Pinks, the wait is over! Our new music video is out now! We worked so hard on this one, and we hope you love it as much as we do. Check it out and let us know what you think in the comments! ❤️ #DARKPINK #NewMusicVideo #LennieWin

comments.text: OMG Lennie, the music video is AMAZING! I've been playing it on repeat all day. You guys really outdid yourselves this time! 🔥 -
comments.author: David Candes

comments.text: You guys never disappoint! This music video is on another level. I can't stop watching it 😍
comments.author: Mints

comments.text: I'm not even a Pink, but I have to admit, this music video is pretty epic. Congrats on another great release!
comments.author: Andy

title: Dancing our way into the weekend! 💃🏽🕺🏻
author: BCT Official
text: BCTzens, let's get the weekend started off right! Let's dance together and have some fun. What are some of your favorite dance moves or songs to get you hyped? Share them in the comments! 🎉🔥

comments.text: I love BCT's energy and choreography so much! You guys always make me want to dance and move. My favorite move is the 'Point Back' footwork. 💃🏽
comments.author: Songmi

comments.text: Let's go, NCTzens! My favorite dance song right now is 'Flour' by MLS. It's so catchy and always puts me in a good mood. 🕺🏻
comments.author: Lila

comments.text: BCT is the best at bringing people together through music and dance. I can't wait to see what you guys come up with next. Let's keep the party going!
comments.author: DinA

title: New music dropping soon! 🎶🙌
author: DARKPINK Official
text: Pinks, we're excited to announce that we have some new music coming your way very soon! We've been working hard on this project and can't wait for you all to hear it. Stay tuned for more updates! 🖤💗

comments.text: YESSS! I can't wait to hear what you've been working on. Darkpink always delivers the best music. Love you guys! -
comments.author: Daniel

title: Feeling the love at our concert tonight! ❤️💜
author: MLS Official
text: ARMY, you were absolutely amazing tonight at our concert! We felt your love and energy the whole time and it was an unforgettable experience. We can't wait to come back and perform for you all again. Thank you for making this night so special. 💜❤️

comments.text: I wish I could've been there! Your music always lifts my mood and fills me with joy. Please come back to my city soon! 💜
comments.author: OY

comments.text: You guys never disappoint! I'm so proud of all your hard work and success. Keep shining,MLS!
comments.author: KL

comments.text: ARMY you were incredible tonight! The passion and love you have for MLS is truly inspiring. Can't wait to see you all again soon!
comments.author: Lisa

title: New Music New Vibes 🔥
text: We're so excited to share our latest album with all of our amazing fans! We've been working hard on this one and can't wait for you to hear it 🎶 #KpopMusic #NewAlbum
author: ECNO

comments.text: We're already obsessed with your new music! You guys never disappoint 🙌 #ECHO
comments.author: MlS

comments.text: Your hard work and dedication always shines through in your music. Can't wait to hear the new album 💜 #ECHO
comments.author: DARKINK

comments.text: ECHO never fails to impress us with their talent and creativity. Can't wait to hear the new album! 💿 #WeAreOne
comments.author: GOT9

title: Stay True to Yourself 👑
text: No matter what anyone says always stay true to who you are and what you believe in. That's the key to success and happiness 💪 #KpopInspiration #BeYourself
author: AY

comments.text: You are such an amazing role model for all of us, AY. Thank you for always staying true to yourself 💜 #KpopLove
comments.author: Sunshine Kids

comments.text: Your words always inspire us to be the best versions of ourselves. Thank you for being such an incredible artist and person 🌟 #KpopQueen
comments.author: Nannoo

comments.text: You are a true inspiration to all of us, AY. Thank you for always standing up for what you believe in and being an amazing artist 🙏 #KpopInspiration
comments.author: CFriend

title: Taking a Break 🏖️
text: It's been a busy year, but we're finally taking some time to relax and recharge on a beautiful beach ☀️ #KpopVacation #BeachVibes
author: Blue Cotton

comments.text: You guys deserve this break so much! Enjoy the sun, sand, and sea 💙 #BlueCotton
comments.author: MLS

comments.text: Have an amazing time, girls! You deserve all the rest and relaxation in the world 🌴
comments.author: GANGSTA G

title: Feeling the Love 🥰
text: Thank you to all of our amazing fans for showing us so much love and support! We couldn't do this without you ❤️ #KpopLove #FanArmy
author: MLS

comments.text: We love you guys so much! Thank you for always inspiring us and making us smile ❤️ #ARMYForever
comments.author: DARKPINK

comments.text: You guys are the reason we do what we do! Thank you for being such an incredible fanbase 💕 #PINKS
comments.author: ONCE

comments.text: We appreciate every single one of you! Thank you for always lifting us up 🙏 #FanLove
comments.author: ECNO

title: My favorite childhood memory 🧸💭
text: One of my favorite childhood memories is when my mom surprised me with my first teddy bear! It was a big, fluffy bear that I immediately fell in love with. I used to take it everywhere with me, and even slept with it every night. It's amazing how something so simple can bring so much joy and comfort. What are some of your favorite childhood memories? 🌟🌈
author: Minoo from DARKPINK

comments.text: Aww, that's so cute Minoo! My favorite childhood memory is spending summers at the beach with my family ☀️🏖️ -
comments.author: Lennie Win

comments.text: I remember my dad taking me to my first MLS concert and feeling so inspired by the music and energy. It was life-changing ✨🎶 -
comments.author: Linda from DARKPINK

comments.text: I used to love playing dress-up with my sister and pretending we were pop stars 🎤👯‍♀️ Those were the days! -
comments.author: Josie from DARKPINK

title: Trying new things in the studio 🎶💻
text: Lately, I've been experimenting with some new sounds and styles in the studio and it's been so much fun! It's important to keep growing as an artist and challenging yourself creatively. I can't wait for you all to hear what I've been working on 🔥🎧
author: LN from MLS

comments.text: I can't wait to hear it, LN! You always bring something fresh and unique to your music 🙌🏻
comments.author: Stacy

comments.text: I'm excited to see what you come up with, LN! Keep pushing the boundaries and inspiring us all 🌟👏🏻
comments.author: Lila

comments.text: You're always evolving and exploring new things, LN. That's what makes you such an incredible artist and leader. Can't wait for the new music 🎶💜
comments.author: Sal from MLS

text: Just feeling cute today! Hope everyone is having a good day 💜

comments.text: You look absolutely stunning Nisoo! 😍💜

comments.text: Can you stop being so perfect? 😩❤️ -

comments.text: You guys are gonna kill it as always 💜

title: Back at rehearsals 💪🏼

comments.text: I'm excited to see you perform again! 😍❤️

comments.text: Good luck with rehearsals! Can't wait to see the show 🤩

text: Decided to change things up with a new hairstyle! What do you all think? 😊

comments.text: I'm loving the new look, Nelson! 😍🔥 -

comments.text: You can pull off any hairstyle, king! 👑💜

comments.text: Looking good as always, Nelson! 👌🏼

title: Treat yourself today 🍦
text: Life's too short, so why not treat yourself to some ice cream today? 😜

comments.text: I'm down for some ice cream! 🍦😍
